akn:section.akn:heading: National strategy, classification, and reporting on cybercrime

akn:content.akn:p: (b) National strategy The Attorney General shall develop a national strategy to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Classification of cybercrimes against individuals for purposes of crime reports

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Classification of cybercrimes against individuals for purposes of crime reports In accordance with the authority of the Attorney General under section 534 of title 28, the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation shall—

(d) Annual summary The Attorney General shall publish an annual summary of the information reported in the Uniform Crime Reports and the National Incident-Based Reporting System relating to cybercrimes against individuals, including an evaluation of the implementation process for the national strategy developed under subsection (b) and outcome measurements on its impact on Tribal and culturally specific communities.
